name: Star's Quest
description:
Help Star Guardian Ahri defeat endless waves of Void monsters (Kog’maws, Cho’gaths and Velkoz), dodge ludicrous numbers of bullets, and rack up the highest score! Gather 400 void stars to activate Spirit Rush and go on a SPARKLY RAMPAGE! Survive long enough to fight the deadly Star Eater!

Have a look at the README for more info on Star's Quest.
